# allocate(capacity:as:)

**Instance Method**

Allocate uninitialized memory for the specified number of instances of type `T`.

## Declaration

```swift
func allocate<T>(capacity: Int, as type: T.Type) -> UnsafeMutableBufferPointer<T>
```
